title: Vocational Hybrid Learning Program for Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Job Competencies and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Combining Work-Based Learning (WBL) with blended instructional design to improve vocational skills and social integration for students with disabilities. Project-based assessments measure practical competencies in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners with disabilities can perform basic workplace communication skills (email writing, business report writing, etc.) required in vocational settings with over 80% accuracy

Learners, in four-person teams, complete a five-day intensive team project based on real IT work scenarios (e.g., web app bug fixes, API integration), conduct three scrum meetings, document five or more problem-solving logs, and submit a final output achieving over 70% on evaluation criteria (collaboration efficiency 40%, problem-solving appropriateness 40%, documentation completeness 20%).
Learners can autonomously complete job-related tasks using digital tools (word processors, video conferencing systems)

constraints.accessibility: 화면 읽기 프로그램 호환, 자막 지원, 색상 대비 최적화

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
